CustomField.description: A sortable text string that represents the hierarchical position of this form component
CustomField.formula:
IF(ISBLANK( Group_Component__c ), RIGHT("0" & TEXT(Sort_number__c), 2), IF(ISBLANK( Group_Component__r.Group_Component__c ), RIGHT("0" & TEXT(Group_Component__r.Sort_number__c), 2) & "." & RIGHT("0" & TEXT(Sort_number__c), 2), IF(ISBLANK( Group_Component__r.Group_Component__r.Group_Component__c ), RIGHT("0" & TEXT(Group_Component__r.Group_Component__r.Sort_number__c), 2) & "." & RIGHT("0" & TEXT(Group_Component__r.Sort_number__c), 2) & "." & RIGHT("0" & TEXT(Sort_number__c), 2), IF(ISBLANK( Group_Component__r.Group_Component__r.Group_Component__r.Group_Component__c), RIGHT("0" & TEXT(Group_Component__r.Group_Component__r.Group_Component__r.Sort_number__c), 2) & "." & RIGHT("0" & TEXT(Group_Component__r.Group_Component__r.Sort_number__c), 2) & "." & RIGHT("0" & TEXT(Group_Component__r.Sort_number__c), 2) & "." & RIGHT("0" & TEXT(Sort_number__c), 2), IF(ISBLANK( Group_Component__r.Group_Component__r.Group_Component__r.Group_Component__r.Group_Component__c), RIGHT("0" & TEXT(Group_Component__r.Group_Component__r.Group_Component__r.Group_Component__r.Sort_number__c), 2) & "." & RIGHT("0" & TEXT(Group_Component__r.Group_Component__r.Group_Component__r.Sort_number__c), 2) & "." & RIGHT("0" & TEXT(Group_Component__r.Group_Component__r.Sort_number__c), 2) & "." & RIGHT("0" & TEXT(Group_Component__r.Sort_number__c), 2) & "." & RIGHT("0" & TEXT(Sort_number__c), 2),
"")))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: A sortable text string that represents the hierarchical position of this form component
